name: Switch Tech, Inc
description: Provider of personal training services intended to develop new fitness habits. The company's virtual sessions provide a cultural mix of instructors and round-the-clock coverage for members in various time zones with the convenience of live video technology and ongoing support, enabling fitness lovers to create new fitness habits that can fit into their busy lives.
one_liner: Provider of personal training services intended to develop new fitness habits.
